import colors from'assets/theme/base/colors';// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from'assets/theme/functions/pxToRem';var transparent=colors.transparent;var select={styleOverrides:{select:{display:'grid',alignItems:'center',padding:"0 ".concat(pxToRem(12)," !important"),'& .Mui-selected':{backgroundColor:transparent.main}},selectMenu:{background:'none',height:'none',minHeight:'none',overflow:'unset'},icon:{display:'none'}}};export default select;
